biotools.summary: Machine learning tool set and web application for monoallelic gene inference from chromatin. Classifies genes into monoallelically expressed (MAE) and biallelically expressed (BAE) using chromatin mark enrichment data.

bioschemas.name: Monoallelic gene inference from chromatin (MaGIC)
bioschemas.summary: Machine learning tool set and web application for monoallelic gene inference from chromatin. Classifies genes into monoallelically expressed (MAE) and biallelically expressed (BAE) using chromatin mark enrichment data.
